text: Freeform has renewed its new Marvel series “ Cloak & Dagger. ” The teen superhero drama will return with a 10 - episode second season in spring 2019. The announcement came during the show ’ s San Diego Comic - Con panel featuring cast members Olivia Holt, Aubrey Joseph, Emma Lahana and Ally Maki, as well as executive producers Joe Pokaski and Jeph Loeb. “ Cloak and Dagger ” follows Tandy Bowen ( Holt ) and Tyrone Johnson ( Joseph ) who are two different kids from very different backgrounds but who find themselves burdened by and awakened to newly discovered superpowers which are mysteriously linked to one another.
